videos.videoDescription: ElektraWeb is the most comprehensive cloud hotel management solution on the market; it is a full PMS including booking engine, channel manager, rate manager, POS, and other additional modules. It has all the features and functions your hotel may need.
Registration for ElektraWeb is quick and easy. So, what are you waiting for?
Save all your hotel features and start managing your property in a short time.
Learn how to quickly perform the basic front office-related operations, such as creating reservations, check-in, check-out, folio and invoice, in ElektraWeb?
Set the main hotel information and easily customize your online booking page.

videos.videoName: Introduction to Basic Definitions Screen and How to add different language options?
videos.videoDescription: All the basic definitions related to room type, board type, rate type, department, revenue and currency settings are done from this menu. Get accustomed to work around this menu and set the desired languages for your property.

videos.videoName: How to set Room Type and Define Room Units and Features
videos.videoDescription: Learn how to define your room units, related features, as well as pricing and usage rules.

videos.videoName: How to define Department, Revenue Group and Currencies?
videos.videoDescription: Define department & department groups, revenue groups and set the currencies used in your hotel property.

videos.videoName: How to define Board Types and Rate Types?
videos.videoDescription: Set your board & rate type definitions and rules easily.

videos.videoName: What it is and how to use Close Cases List?
videos.videoDescription: Learn what is the closed cases list in ElektraWeb and how to use this screen.
